operations with flt collections

Functions

bool surfit::flts_delall ()
 removes all elements from surfit_flts collection

 removes flt from surfit_flts collection at 'pos' position

 reads fault from formatted text file and adds it to surfit_flts collection
bool surfit::flts_load (const char *filename, const char *fltname=NULL)
 reads fault from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_flts collection

 returns flt at 'pos' position in surfit_flts collection

 returns first flt in surfit_isos collection
flt * surfit::flts_last ()
 returns last flt in surfit_flts collection

 returns amount of elements in surfit_flts collection
